metadata.title: CVE-2024-26637 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: ath11k: rely on mac80211 debugfs handling for vifmac80211 started to delete debugfs entries in certain cases, causing aath11k to crash when it tried to delete the entries later. Fix this byrelying on mac80211 to delete the entries when appropriate and addingthem from the vif_add_debugfs handler.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
